thread.title: Tamara-Indiana
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Tamara-Indiana

author: Tamara-Indiana
title: Tamara-Indiana
text: The shipping was super fast, as usual. The Polka E-cig worked for about 20 minutes after charging and has not worked since. This is the first time I have ever had this issue with TW. I am not happy with the product, but will still buy from TW. It was a discounted product. I would not recommend buying this.
